metadata.Title: CVE-2021-43542 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Using XMLHttpRequest, an attacker could have identified installedapplications by probing error messages for loading external protocols. Thisvulnerability affects Thunderbird < 91.4.0, Firefox ESR < 91.4.0, andFirefox < 95.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
